pr_title: Upgrade Spring Boot to 2.3.5 to fix pgpool connection issue

timeline.message:
upgrade postgresql jdbc driver to 42.2.18

Signed-off-by: Xin Li <xin.li@swirlds.com>

timeline.bodyText: Please undo all changes and bump spring-boot to 3.2.5.RELEASE which contains the updated postgresql version. It's always better to let Spring manage our dependencies for us if possible.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -70,6 +70,7 @@
         <jmeter.version>5.3</jmeter.version>
         <micrometer-jvm-extras.version>0.2.0</micrometer-jvm-extras.version>
         <msgpack.version>0.8.21</msgpack.version>
+        <postgresql.version>42.2.18</postgresql.version> <!-- This version fixes the gssEncMode bug: https://github.com/pgjdbc/pgjdbc/pull/1920 -->

timeline.message:
upgrade to spring-boot 2.3.5.RELEASE which brings in postgresql jdbc driver 42.2.18 with the gssEncMode fix

Signed-off-by: Xin Li <xin.li@swirlds.com>

upgrade to spring-boot 2.3.5.RELEASE which brings in postgresql jdbc driver 42.2.18 with the gssEncMode fix

Signed-off-by: Xin Li <xin.li@swirlds.com>
